title: Waymo is asking DoorDash drivers to shut the doors of its self-driving cars
description: If a passenger accidentally leaves a Waymo door open, the vehicle can get stuck in place.

title: OpenAI sidesteps Nvidia with unusually fast coding model on plate-sized chips
‘Uncanny Valley’: ICE’s Secret Expansion Plans, Palantir Workers’ Ethical Concerns, and AI Assistants
description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, our hosts dive into WIRED’s scoop about a secret Trump administration campaign extending right into your backyard.

title: Musk needed a new vision for SpaceX and xAI. He landed on Moonbase Alpha.
description: "I really want to see a mass driver on the moon that is shooting AI satellites into deep space."

title: Anthropic Raises $30B At $380B Valuation In Second-Largest Venture Funding Deal Of All Time
description: Generative AI company Anthropic announced Thursday that it raised $30 billion in a round that values it at $380 billion post-money. The financing marks the largest venture funding deal of 2026 so far and the second-largest of all time, per Crunchbase data.

title: Anthropic raises another $30B in Series G, with a new value of $380B
description: The infusion of funding for the AI startup takes place as it is vying for customers and cultural attention with its competitor, OpenAI.

title: Waymo Asks the DC Public to Pressure Their City Officials
description: Stuck in regulatory limbo, the self-driving-vehicle developer is encouraging residents of Washington, DC, to message public officials to help get its robotaxis onto roads.

title: OpenAI’s President Gave Millions to Trump. He Says It’s for Humanity
description: In an interview with WIRED, Greg Brockman says his political donations support OpenAI's mission—even if some employees at the company disagree.

title: A new version of OpenAI’s Codex is powered by a new dedicated chip
description: OpenAI calls the new coding tool the "first milestone" in its relationship with the chipmaker.

title: SpaceX takes down Dragon crew arm, giving Starship a leg up in Florida
OpenAI researcher quits over ChatGPT ads, warns of "Facebook" path
Amid Record Robotics Funding, Apptronik Raises $520M Series A Extension To Boost Production Of Humanoid Robot Apollo
description: After receiving “substantial inbound investor interest,” AI-powered robotics company Apptronik says it raised $520 million in an extension of its $415 million Series A in February 2025, bringing the total round to over $935 million.

title: AI Industry Rivals Are Teaming Up on a Startup Accelerator
description: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and a host of other major tech companies have found common ground in F/ai, a new startup accelerator based out of Paris.

title: SpaceX's next-gen Super Heavy booster aces four days of "cryoproof" testing
Palantir CEO Alex Karp Recorded a Video About ICE for His Employees
description: In a video shared with Palantir employees, Alex Karp did not explain how ICE is utilizing the company’s products. Instead, workers were told they can sign NDAs if they want detailed information.

title: Shield AI, ST Engineering join forces on fine-tuning drone swarms
description: The companies will use artificial intelligence to optimize the interactions of drones with drones, and drones with humans.

title: Rocket Report: SpaceX probes upper stage malfunction; Starship testing resumes
OpenAI is hoppin' mad about Anthropic's new Super Bowl TV ads
Should AI chatbots have ads? Anthropic says no.
Nvidia's $100 billion OpenAI deal has seemingly vanished
Does Anthropic believe its AI is conscious, or is that just what it wants Claude to think?
